AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always enjoyed the calm of going out into the wilderness, and tracking one of the beasts found there. Pyandonea was home to some strange creatures, and while [PAWN_nameDef] was never scared, the thought of encountering a lizard bull did make [PAWN_objective] nervous.
